measure.CatchLine: Authorizes certain cities with a demonstrated need for housing to add a project area to their urban growth boundary upon certain conditions.
measure.MeasureSummary:
Digest: This Act creates processes by which cities can amend their UGBs or urban reserves. (Flesch Readability Score: 71.7). 
	Authorizes certain cities with a demonstrated need for housing to add a project area to their urban growth boundary upon certain conditions. Sunsets the authorization January 2, 2035. 
	Amends principles that the Land Conservation and Development Commission must consider in adopting rules regulating urban reserves. 
	Declares an emergency, effective on passage.
measure.RelatingToFull: Relating to urbanization; creating new provisions; amending ORS 197A.245; and declaring an emergency.
measure.RelatingTo: Relating to urbanization; declaring an emergency.
measure.FiscalImpact: May have fiscal impact, but no statement yet issued
measure.RevenueImpact: May have revenue impact, but no statement yet issued

historyActions.ActionText: Introduction and first reading. Referred to President's desk.
